title: Hire an App Developer
desc: Application will be use as a reference tool. All data/information will be saved on the application. No internet required. I will want ads on the application to generate some ROI. I would like the application to run on android and ios. The application shouldn't be too difficult since it is only referencing material.______________________________________________________________________________________Scope of application:The application is tailored to help police officers on traffic stops. A quick look on the app should help them know what penal codes have been violated and what section is charged.Example:A citizen runs a red light in the state of California. The officer conducts a traffic stop and decides to write a ticket. The application will give a quick reference to the penal code section which is 21453 (a) VC - Failure to stop at a solid red light. The application will also give a brief description of the violation.Application layout:Home page - Will have 4 sections; Penal code references, age calculator, recommended court date, and settings.Specific Details (Penal Code):The penal code section will have a list of possible violations such as Stop signs, License/Registration, Vehicle Equipment, Towing Authority, etc. I will provide a full list of each section frequently used in law enforcement. There should also be a simple way to edit the words and listing in each section. Laws change and I would like to be able to edit the laws and sections if there are changes in the future.Example:Stop signs —>  list 21453(a) VC —>   details on the violation of 21453(a) VCSpecific Details (Age Calculator):In this section, I would to be able to enter a date of birth (DOB) in order to quickly determine someone’s age. For Example, if someone was born on October 1, 1989, the application should show that with this birth date, the citizen is 28 years old.Specific Details (Recommended court date):This section should provide a court date to the officer that is 8 weeks out from todays date. Example, if today is January 1, 2017, the application should show a court date of the specific date length of February 20 - 24. In other words, the application will show a possible date of Monday - Friday. Monday through Friday are the only days the courts are open.Now I foresee a possible problem on the development in this section. First, if the court date is a holiday, then the courts will be closed. So the given court date will not work.Solution, aside from being able select a date 8 weeks in advance. I would like the user to be able to change this to 1 of 4 selections. The selections be will change the future date to either 5 weeks, 6 weeks, 7 weeks, or 8 weeks.The user should also be able to pick specific day (Monday, Wednesday, Friday, etc.) aside from editing the weeks. I believe if the user is allowed to set up 8 weeks out and a specific day of wednesday, given its January 1, 2017, the application should show February 22, 2017. This date will change week to week. The change will occur on a Saturday and following the next day, it should show the next weeks date on Wednesday, which would be March 1, 2017.Example:8 weeks out —> Wednesday —> from todays date 1/1/17 should show 2/22/178 weeks out —> Wednesday —> from todays date 1/9/17 should show 3/1/178 weeks out —> Wednesday —> from todays date 4/7/17 should show 5/24/17Specific Details (settings):Settings should include the ability to send an email for any suggestions. I will provide an email account to receive these messages.Also I would like the ability to change the color of the background to a sold black contras. Many officers work during the night, so having the ability to change from a lighter background to a sold black background would be easier on the eyes.Return on investment (ROI):Banners ads will most likely be the only source of income for this application. It is essential to be able to include a banner ad on this application to have some return on investment.Platform:This application should be developed for both Apple’s IOS and Android. Specific layout should be set out for phone displays.Time length: 2-3 week turn aroundPayment: Specified before development.

title: Mobile App Development
desc: I want to create a tinder like feature for businesses and investors who are looking for businesses to fund in.On the company side, first a user has to pick to register as a company or as an investor, then the company will have to create an account, the information needed to create an account will include company name and information (address, phone number and company email). They can choose to upload their logo as well. They will also need to register with a user name (the representative’s email) as well as a password. Once that is created they will be able to upload a video to the app that will be viewed by investors.On the investor’s side, they will first have to choose to register as an investor or as a company looking to invest. Then they will need to create an account with the same info as the company. Once that is done they will have to agree to a privacy agreement. Once that is done they will then be able to view and swipe through companies looking to invest. Swiping up if investor is interested and swiping down if not interested.From there a chat will open up to allow the two to communicate. Also, contact information will be viewable on both sides.

title: Dual Channel Function Generator
desc: Dual channel function / waveform / signal generator for the speaker / headphone audio output.App must put a waveform on the audio output at 44.1 kHz and with a resolution of 16-bit. Two separate waveforms can be output to the left and right audio output channels respectively.• Sine, square & triangular waveforms.• Frequency range from 1 mHz up to 22 kHz.• Amplitude as percentage 0-100%.• Set duty for square waveforms or skew triangular waveforms to get saw waveforms.• Shift the start phase of waveforms.• Sweep frequency or amplitude (Single, Repeat & Bounce modes).• Amplitude Modulation (AM).• Frequency Modulation (FM).• Burst mode for a specific number of waveforms (1-10000)• White noise & pink noise generator.

title: Encrypt A Video
desc: SCENARIO: A proprietary video is downloaded from a specific website onto an android or ioS device.REQUIREMENT: The development of a custom-built, unique app which would be required to be installed before the propriety video could be played by any standard video player e.g. windows media player or VLC player. However, the app must ensure that the video will only play on a device onto which both the proprietary video and the custom-built app were downloaded. Consequently, a digital copy of the video must not work on any other device. Further, to the normal eyes, the downloaded video must appear clear when played. However, if a copy is recorded off the screen of a device, the recorded copy should be of a poor quality.

title: Microsoft PowerApps Developer
desc: Ostendo Solutions is looking for a self-motivated and collaboration focused candidate to design, build, support, and maintain mobile applications leveraging Microsoft PowerApps. We are a consulting firm who contracts exclusively to Microsoft Corporation. This is a remote position, relocation is not required, and is a great way to get your foot into the door and experience the Microsoft culture. This is a contract position for a minimum of two months and the ideal candidate must be able to start as soon as possible.Requirements:- Need to be familiar with and understand Microsoft PowerApps- Needs to know APIs and how to integrate into back-end systems- Previous experience with Microsoft applications or work/internship highly preferred- Proven experience as a Web Developer or equivalent background- Experience in web design and programming- Knowledge of UI, browser compatibility, web functions and standards.- Experience with relational database systems, object oriented programming, web application development and search engine optimization- Excellent organizational, planning and time management skills- Advanced attention to detail and problem solving skills- Solid communication skills (written and verbal)- BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalentResponsibilities- Design, develop, code, test, and debug mobile applications- Write well designed, testable, efficient code.- Maintain, expand, and scale websites as needed.- Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.- Coordinate with web designers to match visual design intent.- Design, code and debug applications in various software languages.- Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.- Evaluate and identify new technologies for implementation.- Create unit test plans/case, develop, unit test, conduct code and unit test walk-throughs- Work with users to define existing or new system scope and objectives- App support and maintenance after launch

desc: I would like to receive a quotation for an iOs and Android native App Synchronizing with PrestaShop Store.Below, some of the required features:- Automatic Synchronization with my online Store (PrestaShop). All data on the app needs to be downloaded and uploaded from/to the online store: Products Categories, Products, Customer informations (Login, Products on Cart, Buying products, etc),- Easy app modifications: Color, Logo, Fonts, etc.- App Layout:- > Sidebar with: Login, Logout, Customer Photo, Customer informations, Customer Cart;- > On login/signup: Google, Facebook, Button asking customer to receive emails from the store; Register customer information on PrestaShop Store;- > Home: Search tool on the top, with filtering feature, Main banner of the store, Category selection, List of products the selected category;- > Geolocalization Page: Geolocalization tool on Another page, showing the products nearby. title: Write an Android application
desc: Very easy project.  Similar to some apps already.  Need the ability for a user to create a unique business card.  Basically how it would work, user selects the template.  Upload stock image, phone gallery image or camera image to the template.  User then selects another template (which is the back side of the first template) and enters contact info.  This could be via fill in forms or by text box pop up.  User previews both the front and back of their design and then saves.  User can buy design and if so, checks out to pay.  Design is set to our printing company and we print the card and mails it to the User.The template has to be printer ready so that we can download the design and send directly to the printer without have to fuss with the design.  We may also need to print out a copy of the sales order which would be included with the card being sent to the user.There are other details but the above is the basics.  This app would be available for both apple and android.Please quote cost to design as you understand this project.  Please provide examples of apps you have done, especially those that might be related.  Any spam will be flagged.  If you are sending app examples be prepared to back up any claim that you are the developer of that app.Thanks,Scott11/16/2017 at 11:35 MST - Additional information submittedPLEASE READ - this is for a mobile phone application not a logo/graphic job!
